entry.paragraph: No, they are not, however it is good practice to use only lowercase letters.

entry.entryTitle: How do you validate an HTML5 document?
entry.paragraph:
HTML5 documents that are syntactically correct are guaranteed to render properly
HTML5 documents that contain syntax errors may not display properly
Validation services (e.g., W3C Markup Validation Service ensure that an HTML5 document is syntactically correct

entry.entryTitle: What heading elements does HTML5 provide?
entry.paragraph:
HTML5 provides six heading elements (h1 through h6) for specifying the relative importance of information
Heading element h1 is considered the most significant heading and is rendered in the largest font.
Each successive heading element (i.e., h2, h4, etc.) is rendered in a progressively smaller font.
